inputs.prompt:
Shot 1 (0-2s): Boy turns alarmed, shouts: "Run! NOW!" They break pose, start running right, exit frame. Snow kicks up.
Shot 2 (2-4s): Side tracking. Running through forest hand-in-hand, hair streaming, trees blur past. Look back fearfully.
Shot 3 (4-6s): Low angle. Leap over log, airborne slow-mo, land and run into mist. Dark shapes pursue behind.
Sound: shout, rapid footsteps, breathing, branches, pursuit sounds. Color: increased contrast, dark shadows behind.
